tool_description: API to convert natural language words into numbers. Currently available in english and italian and limited to billions
name: Words to numbers
title: Words to numbers

api_list.name: words2number
api_list.description: Returns the corresponding number for your input sentence. Specify the language with the associated request parameter (currently available for italian ("it") and english ("en"))

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.default: twentyone thousands three hundreds and thirty
